title: How to Hecarim (Bronze Edition)

embed.description: Hecarim Jungle is insanely fun :D, really enjoyed playing him in season 6 so far, with the right runes he should be even better! ►► Subscribe to Join us on our Adventures!: ►https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVjr676PJJDILJ1fXH496TQ CHECK US OUT @ ►Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/TwinzAU ►Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/TwinzAU ►Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/TwinzAU

body:
First time Hecarim Jungle feels <3
Hope you guys enjoy this little montage i put together :D
(Feedback Appreciated)

replies.body: Those sounds when you charged made me lol
